title: Foundational Computer Science Education Utilizing Problem-Solving Studios and Pair Programming

context.additional_context: A foundational computer science course linked to social studies for in-service practitioners, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively solve problems of varying difficulty levels while applying core computer science concepts
Learners can perform effective communication and code reviews with peers using pair programming techniques
Learners can revise and improve problem-solving strategies based on real-time feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
